data.actual_result: Upload status bar persists, no way to remove it unless you restart discord. Reported for <@217661605603835904>
data.expected_result: Discord must tell you that file could not be uploaded.
data.short_description: File uploading bar persists even if upload has failed
data.steps_to_repro: - Disconnect from internet. - Upload it in a text channel. -Re-connect to internet.
